ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISBLANK( RW_Project_Unit__c), !ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Qualification"),!ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Lost"),!ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Site Visit"),!ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Cancelled"),!ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Outbound Meeting"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This stage can not be selected if project unit is not filled.
